Shop Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Items: Shop Items
By John Hawley on Monday, December 10, 2001 - 12:02 pm:

These items are available in the shop from the start of the game.


ITEMCOSTIN-GAME DESCRIPTIONTECMO'S DESCRIPTION
HoneyCandy100Honey candy. Great for snacks for monsters.Reduces Fatigue
Cookies200A cookie with a spicy taste. Great for snacks.no special effect
Mango300Sweet southern fruit. Great for monster snacks!no special effect
Nitroberry300Refreshing taste removes fatigue from monsters.Stress reduction
Roast Newt500A bitter taste feared by monsters. Used as medicine.Spoil decrease - fear increase
Lethe Rx 1300 Medicine that makes monster forget 1st trait.*
Lethe Rx 2300 Medicine that makes monster forget 2nd trait.*
Lethe Rx 3300 Medicine that makes monster forget 3rd trait.*
Lethe Rx 4300 Medicine that makes monster forget 4th trait.*
Lethe Rx 5300 Medicine that makes monster forget 5th trait.*
Lethe Rx 6300 Medicine that makes monster forget 6th trait.*
Shiny Gem5000Relieves a little stress from monsters. Effects when you own.*
Sparkle Gem25000Reduces stress in monsters. Effects when you own.*
Bright Gem65000Greatly reduces monster stress. Effects when you own.*
Silver Cup5000Water from this cup removes minor fatigue. Effects when you own.*
Gold Cup25000Water from this cup removes some stress. Effects when you own.*
Holy Cup65000Water from this cup greatly reduces fatigue. Effects when you own.*
Incense4000Helps spirit relax allowing peaceful sleep. Effects when you own.*
Aroma Pot16000Helps body and spirit relax allowing deep sleep. Effects when you own.*

* - same as in-game description
